library.description:
creator : Nikola Lukic
about : Visual JS 2d canvas multiplatform game engine
This is JavaScript game engine (server part node.js / client part js)
Js framework with windows GUI editor and game instance creator.

visual js API help

Take a look : 

-Add new game Object with single image:
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/rjf0xe0a/

-Use For loop for creating objects
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/noax17kz/

-Visual JS -Add Webcam to Object
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/xsffd9v6/

-Add webcam with motion detect
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/j60hh052/

-ZoomIn/ZoomOut game_object effect
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/pjjow5q6/

-Translate object
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/0tt6rmnq/

-Rotate object ( OSCILLATOR class )
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/1x7bq0gf/

-Add particle
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/hoe9auLm/

-Add textbox
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/0u5j1ap8/

-Webcam image manipulation  (webcam - frame by frame)
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/u2f9wbzh/

-You can draw any native js canvas2d example in visual-js
https://jsfiddle.net/zlatnaspirala/p4n98p9n/

view all at : https://jsfiddle.net/user/zlatnaspirala/fiddles/

New updates : 
-multiPeer implemented (2d/3d part)
-AR motion

nightly build (best): 
https://bitbucket.org/nikola_l/visual-js
library.name: visual-js game engine

library.description:
The Japanese scripting/IF/Dating Sim game engine that powered "Jurassic Heart" is now available in English. It is a high level scripting language similar to Ren'Py with the advantage that it produces HTML5/JS games, so you can release your work on browsers and smartphones with no extra effort.

Although the scripting language supports many common tasks, it is a real game engine with support for arbitrary HTML and JavaScript as well.
library.name: TyranoScript

library.description: Matter.js is a 2D rigid body physics engine for the web written in JavaScript
library.name: Matter.js

library.description: Visual novel engine for web javascript based.
library.name: vnjson.js

library.description: Open Source JavaScript game SDK for iOS, Android and Web. Debug in the browser, test in simulator, refresh to update code (no compile, no upload, etc.) Battle tested in several top-10 games. GPLv3 or Game Closure Free License.

library.description:
Game creator software that can export HTML5 or native games.
No programming skills is required: Anyone can create a game using Game Develop thanks to the intuitive events system used to build all the game logic.
library.name: Game Develop
